website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive solution for dogs who experience anxiety and over-excitement.
pros: Some users preferred this coat over the ThunderShirt due to its extra stretchy material
cons: Doesn't cover as much of the dog as the ThunderShirt does
Long-haired dogs may have issues with the Velcro fastening system

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have a four year old make English Bull Terrier who recently started to have general anxiety issues. He would just sit there and shake, never seemed relaxed, and getting him to eat was a chore. As soon as I put this on him he stretched out on the floor and for the first time in months just relaxed (pictured). It is wonderful having his old self back. I used to work at a pet store that sold the Thundershirt and to be honest I like this wrap better. The material is stretchier and softer. My guy is around 60lbs but is on the thinner side and could have done with a medium, but the large will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not for anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This shirt isn't thick enough to really provide any calming properties. It is essentially a t-shirt for dogs. In order to provide calming sensations the shirt would have to provide some pressure and this material is so thin that it cannot do that. I thought I was saving some money by going with an off-brand but I should have just paid the extra and gotten the actual Thunder Jacket for my pup, because that's what I ended up doing anyway.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harding

customer_reviews.title: Really Like It
customer_reviews.text: We have used Thundershirts in the past, but thought we would give this a try. Very easy to put on. Fits like a glove on our doodle. We have only had this wrap a short while, but she seems to really like it. A Thundershirt definitely calmed our dog and it appears Mellow Shirt works too. A ThunderShirt has an additional flap that is really nice for adjusting for a snug fit and keeping everything secure and the fabric is nicer. But for the price, MellowShirt seems great.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: This vest has helped our dog tremendously. We adopted a chihuahua mix from the pound who likes to bark at any unfamiliar sound he hears (and even some familiar ones too). This vest calms him to the point that he doesn't bark every time a dog barks on tv. Is it a total problem solver? No, but every little bit helps and Little Lord Fauntleroy is very proud of his fancy duds.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kaden

customer_reviews.title: Easy exchange for the right size
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt for anxious dogs. I looked at many different brands and this one was a good price with a good amount of reviews. When originally ordering this shirt I ordered a size small for a 17lb female daschund (weiner dog) and it was way to big. The small would have been a better fit for a shih tzu. I was able to easily exchange for a x small and the fit is perfect. An hour after putting it on the shaking and pacing around stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Review!
customer_reviews.text: 5 star review! Just got this for a car trip we took yesterday. Our dog HATES the car. She shakes, drools, and often ends up throwing up (very pleasant). Our vet suggested trying one of these pressure wraps. Long story short...it worked! She laid down and practically slept for the entire trip. A first. And she seemed to like having it on. Thumbs way up!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Stay the hell away
customer_reviews.text: These people are nuts! Don't bother buying this product! I paid for a new shirt, but the one I got is completely covered with long hair from some other dog. I have a small Rat Terrier with very short hair. I am not putting this on my dog! Disgusting! The seller should be ashamed!!!
customer_reviews.author: mbeyder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Don't as me how or why but this wrap really did bring my dog comfort! My dog is a schnauzer and is super-duper hyper!! When I put this wrap on she calmed down significantly but unfortunately after a while she got used to it so now I take it off and put it on once in a while like if I'm sick or have a headache and it works, I just can't leave it on her all the time. But if you are going to use this during a storm or fireworks I highly recommend giving this a try it is amazing. If it worked on my super hyper crazy dog it should definitely work on yours!
customer_reviews.author: JenDelRio:)

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us...
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy is a barker, gets upset at every passerby, bike, car, mailman (mail person), you name it, he barks at it or cowers, so we thought we would give shirt a try. Oh, well. It did nothing to clam him down, the only difference between the dog before and after, is now he has a cool blue shirt when he goes ape sh-t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go with the original brand instead.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a reliable alternative to the expensive popular brand-named product. It is a disappointment. It isn't long enough to even cover my dogs ribs, the fabric is flimsy and further bunches up when in use. With only one layer of velcro, it is difficult to get a snug fit. I would suggest shelling out for the better product. I feel like the price of this was wasted.
customer_reviews.author: J N

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed by this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed by this product. Once it arrived I painstakingly put it on my puppy for short periods at first, then allowing him to wear it for several hours. The first time I let him wear it when I wasn't with him he tore it to shreds. Apparently it made him more anxious. Not good. I want a refund. I'll gladly send photos of the destroyed product.
customer_reviews.author: musiqman

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS! GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! My Golden doodle "Colby" has always been terrified of thunder and lightning and fireworks. We haven’t had any storms yet, but we did have a neighbor going a little nuts with fireworks last night. I put the shirt on him and he calmed down immediately. It actually worked -- my dog is much calmer. He is happy to wear it and it doesn't seem to make him warm or uncomfortable at all. I would recommend this to anyone who has a frightened or anxious pet. It’s a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. Stayed on
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Stayed on. Our dog seems to like it, and she seems calmer. I know from experience that swaddling a baby works, so this made some sense to me. Sure seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: jss747

customer_reviews.title: Used, not new!  Disgraceful
customer_reviews.text: Used item sold as new! Long black hairs. It drove my Beagle crazy when I attempted to put it on her.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Reed

customer_reviews.title: Cut to fit
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to work. I ordered by the measurements and had to order a size smaller to get the right fit. The concept is great and my dog LOVES it. The problem is he gets it wet underneath when he goes because the fabric is too far back. I ended up cutting about 3 inches off the back and he can now wear it without any wetness. I did the same to the front and cut about 4 inches off the neck so it wouldn't hang out so much. He's a 50 lb heeler mix with a 20" chest. Got him a medium because large was huge.
customer_reviews.author: Coolsaya

customer_reviews.title: Instant results
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy I purchased this shirt for my dog. The day it came, we had a bad wind storm, so I wrapped it around him and he stopped barking and running around from room-to-room. In fact, for the longest time, he stood in the kitchen like a statue...sometimes closing his eyes. He finally went and laid down on his bed for an hour. I think he felt comforted like the description said. This is going to come in handy for my first road trip with the little guy who can't seem to calm down and sleep the whole way. Hopefully, this will change that for him!
customer_reviews.author: clickshopper

customer_reviews.title: Ill fitting and flimsy, too stretchy, no support. Had to buy the Original Thunder and AKC for my other dog..
customer_reviews.text: This item does not fit my dog well. It is possibly a combination of both, my dog's shape and the product. It is too stretchy and ill fitting. I have both the Original Thunder Shirt and the AKC Calm Coat for my other dog. Their fabric quality is different as night and day compared to this. I Thought I could get away with buying this cheaper version for my other dog. I bought the right size but this one offers no support and the neck Velcro is too long. When you wrap it under the belly to tighten it it just stretches out the underarm and puckers. Cheaper is not always better.
customer_reviews.author: Joy813

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This came with instructions for the fit, but I'm still not sure I have it on right. It is supposed to fit snug, I think the measurements were true to the sizing I received. Color is almost a pink red color. I can't say it works or doesn't work, I don't notice a difference, but my dog's anxiety is more tummy issues, not shaking and visible issues. We haven't had fireworks to test it there, but I surely will! I would buy again and I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: BrownFamily

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is super scared of fireworks. I bought this to help calm him. I additionally gave him benadryl put tv on and all air conditioners in the basement. Nope, did nothing. He was so freaked he tried to hide in the furniture and even peed on the couch (never goes in the house not even on pads). I am glad I bought the cheaper brand to try it out but will never recommend to anyone. I wasn't expecting it to work totally on its own but it should have done it's job along with the other aids set in place.
customer_reviews.author: jdls

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I have a 17 lb pug and the "x-small", 10 to 19 lbs was ordered, it barely fits. I then ordered a "small", 20 to 29 lbs, it is way too big and you can not even fasten velcro strips. The sizes do not make any sense. Had to return both.
customer_reviews.author: USA is #1

customer_reviews.title: Lulu LOVES her Jammies!
customer_reviews.text: This little shirt fits my little girl perfectly and she LOVES it. Lulu is VERY frightened of thunder storms, but this shirt has eliminated her anxiety during storms and was a Godsend on the 4th of July! This is the second one I have bought for her so she has a back-up. We call the Mellow Shirt her Jammies. When I ask her, "do you want to put your jimmies on?", she jumps right up onto the bed and does this! Anyone who owns a dog who has anxiety should try this shirt! It is light weight so it won't overheat your dog, and gives a nice smooth fit. It is also about 2/3 the price of the Thunder Shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J. Dowdle

customer_reviews.title: ... a 8 year old Jack Russell that has been super hyper since we got him from the pound 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 8 year old Jack Russell that has been super hyper since we got him from the pound 6 years ago. We recently bought some property about 100 miles away, even though he loves it there, the car ride was a nightmare. He barked and cried the whole way. As soon as I put the mellow shirt on him his whole demeanor changed. I can't believe the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last! My dog loved it too much.
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how well this works. I tried it on my dog the first day and he was not too excited about it. However this weekend I decided to try it again and he loved it. When I take it off he comes to me with it because he wants it back on. The sad part is now after less than a week there is a hole on the fabric and the Velcro is coming off. I will probably see if a different manufacturer makes the same thing. I am only giving it one star because it fell apart. I would Give five stars for his excitement and response to wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Escape

customer_reviews.title: No attacks on guests since getting this for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: Got this knockoff thundershirt for my big cat - It is a legit miracle. This cat has anxiety. I'm not saying that because he's a Millennial - it's due to his pre-rescue life, poor guy. He loves people but would go nutters over fast movement and guests coming in and out. This keeps him stable and welcoming and noticeably less frantic. My vet recommended it and it's been amazing. No need to spend the extra bucks on the name brand, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the $$
customer_reviews.text: For the $$ it's good enough for our purposes. For endurance I've reinforced the stitching @ the velcro at the neck. Also at the neck I've added more velcro where the end of the neck tab hits underneath. Otherwise that end just flaps down & lends no further support. Its sturdier now with both adjustments for our beefy bulldog. It pills alot more than our Thunder Shirt brand too. Because of that I let it air dry to keep the pilling down.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had our Mellow Shirt a short while, but looking great so far. Our pup has separation anxiety while we are at work. A trainer recommended ThunderCoat, but thought we'd save a few bucks and try this. He seems much calmer as we leaving and haven't had an unpleasant surprises coming home (yay!).
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Less effective than I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: This coat is less complicated than the leading brand, with only one flap around the torso rather than overlapping flaps. While that makes it easier to put on the dog, it also means it isn't as effective at calming his tremors (he has a neurological disorder). It does fit, arrived on time, and is the pictured color. I haven't had it long enough to evaluate its durability other than to say it made it through its first wash with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. My puppy is blind and this is working ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. My puppy is blind and this is working miracles for her. Adopted her just last November. She is 7 months old. Also have one for our Pit Bull. He get reall frightened at 4th of July and this is wonderful. Would be nice if it was in people size. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K Wright

customer_reviews.title: Helps dogs to stay calm
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dog (lab mix) who gets anxious with thunder storms and fire works. The shirt is good quality and is easy to put on and remove. Seems to help her stay calmer during these loud noises. She does not seem uncomfortable and the shirt fits very well. Would recommend for anyone who has a dog that gets anxious.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Seems comfy to touch
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my crazy barker dog. She barks at EVERYTHING except thunder and fireworks, go figure. She likes wearing her harness and clothes so I thought this would be better than wearing her harness all the time. It’s lightweight but sturdy. It doesn’t feel like it would be too hot to wear. The Velcro straps are easy to fasten and easy to put on. My dog is a mini Schnauzer/Jack Russell mix and weighs 26 pounds. She’s pretty stout. I ordered the medium based on weight and it’s perfect. I ordered the orchid color and it’s a nice color. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably not worth it. VELCRO IS LOUD. NOT GOOD FOR NOISE SENSITIVE DOG.
customer_reviews.text: I have one dog with thunder issues and another dog with fireworks issues. Time ran out for return before I had a thunderstorm to test it on or I would be returning it. I’m not sure, but it might’ve had a very, very slight effect on thunderstorm panic, but nothing much. So I’ll give it a 1, maybe 2 for effectiveness. I’ll probably have to wait until July 4 for fireworks test. I will push rating up to 2 because it’s cute and the material is light and stretchy: 90% polyester, 10% spandex. Okay, same with fireworks small to no difference in panic. Big problem getting off of dog 2 because the loud velco freaked him out more than fireworks.
customer_reviews.author: stephenothera

customer_reviews.title: Worked like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I got the small for my corgi mix (22 lbs) and it fit her perfectly. I originally purchased it for separation anxiety when I go out of town. But I also thought it might be useful because she completely freaks out when she hears any high-pitched sounds (mainly alarms, but also some sounds from television shows). She'll sit directly on my lap and tremble, and it takes a long time for her to calm down. Today the smoke alarm of my upstairs neighbor was beeping the low battery sound. She got in my lap like usual, but then I put the shirt on her and she calmed right down and laid next to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Almost funny how well it works
customer_reviews.text: It’s almost funny how well this works to calm my chihuahua. I’d been considering getting one for a while, but some recent night construction near my apartment finally convinced me to give it a try. My chihuahua has been restlessly running around my bed and cowering on my chest and neck when the noise starts, but after a minute or so with the mellow shirt on she settles down and goes to sleep. I don’t even need to keep it on her once she has calmed down. She is 12 lb with 16.5 in chest, 10.5 in neck, and 14 in length and x-small fits perfect. Definitely go a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Omaha Nightblade

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased! Couldn't wait to get this for my rescue ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Couldn't wait to get this for my rescue furbaby because he suffers with anxiety. He did extremely well on his two walks since I purchased this. My neighbor insists on petting my dog even though he is afraid of men. My dog snapped at him, but I don't think that is a reflection of this item as much as it is a reflection on my neighbor. Anyhoo, I think anyone who purchased this will see a difference in their furbaby too.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara L. Brooks-Barnes

customer_reviews.title: I was sceptical...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't have much substance to it so I was sceptical about how much it would help...we used it last night during thunder and fireworks and she was totally zonked out for both, didn't even lift her head. Normally she would be right up against the side of my bed or trying the get up on the bed with me. The true test will be when I have her in the car...I will update after that.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi B

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: Our little ShihTzu/? mix gets terrified with the flashes of thunderstorms (And, my electronic camera flash!) He tries to hide in dark places, and shivers. I don't use my camera flash near him any more, and put the shirt/jacket on him whenever he needs it. It seems to help...not immediately, but quickly. He seems to know, and runs over to where I can put the jacket on him.
customer_reviews.author: humminboid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on a fussy dog
customer_reviews.text: Used during thunderstorm and fireworks. While my dog still had issues this did help to a point. He is not panting but still shaking. He did come out of his anxiety faster. He refuses to take anything orally as I am assuming he doesn’t like how it makes him feel. Each dog has different levels of anxiety so for some I can see it working while others it may not. My choice was based on if it works awesome. I will keep using
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The extra small fit my 12 pound chihuahua mix great though.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say it totally mellowed out my dog, but it sort of worked. There is a huge difference between the small and extra small though. Got a small for my 18 pound min pin mix and it was way too long on him, but the extra small was too small. The extra small fit my 12 pound chihuahua mix great though.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany H

customer_reviews.title: Runs kind of large
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little guy who is afraid of the dark and gets anxiety every night. He is about 15 pounds so I went for the small, but it ended up being too large for him. He is a pretty lanky little dude and the stomach strap is just a little too big and the neck strap is way too big, to the point where there isn't enough velcro for it to attach to and most of the shirt has layers doubled up. The stitching seems pretty decent and the material is pretty thin and stretchy, so I don't think it should cause issues with overheating.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rubalcaba

customer_reviews.title: Wow! My dog is so happy!
customer_reviews.text: My pekingnese is full of anxiety. On our walks, the least little thing causes him to come unglued and nearly yank my arm off. This arrived today and we tried it out on our afternoon walk. He stayed right by my side and was completely unbothered by things that normally th would have sent him into a barking/pulling tailspin. I REALLY hope this is not a fluke because I dont want to medicate him as the vet has recommended. We've done basic obedience training and he did great as long as he could stay focused on me. Hoping mellow shirt is the answer. I will update if it does seem to have been a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying this for my dog. She’s pace the house nearly all day. But I took a leap of faith and got it. I put it on her shortly after it was delivered. Within half hour she was laying down on the couch. I was amazed,but still skeptical. But the next day no pacing and chillin on the bed and couch. Although it didn’t do much for her vet visit but that was ok. Our vet was pleased that I got it for her. I highly recommend get this. It may not work right away but give it a little time for your dog to adjust to it. It well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Way too big.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Doxy Terrier mix. By the sizing given the size S I ordered should have fit perfectly. Sadly no. This was way too big. There was too much fabric to wrap around his middle and there’s no way to get it fitting properly with that much extra fabric. Save your money. Get a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great option for anxiety and other shirts too thick!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been suffering for years. I didn't buy a thundershirt because they are too thick. Saw this. Bought it. Thunder came. She was shivering. Put this on her. She is laying in her bed, not shaking. Not anxiety ridden. OMG! I feel so bad I just got this now. I should have looked for a thinner matetial years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Keldog

customer_reviews.title: Shirt was too long for my little guy
customer_reviews.text: I like this shirt but size is way too long. I have a chihuahua that is full chested and he outgrew his Thunder Jacket XS. That brand was out of stock so I found this one. Measuring his chest, I needed a Small. But his body is not long and the shirt was hitting his private part. I sewed seams to take in the extra length and it now fits. Good thing I can sew. By weight, he would be an XS but it would not have wrapped around his chest. This one is awkward to velcro under him compared to the Thunder Jacket but it works.
customer_reviews.author: pdenney

customer_reviews.title: Great for mini dachshunds!!
customer_reviews.text: My mini dachshund has anxiety, he loves this mellow shirt, he gets so excited when he sees me holding it. It definitely seems to calm him and I can tell he feels comfortable with it. I was worried at first when leaving him while we went to work because he has worked normal dog t-shirts off within minutes, but this stayed put all day and through the night when needed. I also used it when he had an allergy issue from the grass breaking his tummy out, he would not mess or scratch while the mellow vest was on.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: following the sizing guide for this item, we purchased the extra large for our pittie who gets very anxious when thunderstorms are in the area. The size is WAY too big for her - even tho her measurements were well within the size guide. we tried to put it on her and even trying to get it as snug as we could, it was just too big. It could easily fit a dog twice her size. Needless to say it is pretty much useless and covered in hair now from trying to put it on her, so trying to return it would most likely be a no go. Rather disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Heartless One

customer_reviews.title: Fits well & Works Well.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it out yet, but fits well. Edited to add: one star and new text We had a thunderstorm last night, which is rare in this area. While the shirt did not completely eliminate my dog's fear and stress it reduced it to stress panting and some anxious behavior. Without the shirt she would have been shivering and looking for ways to escape. You experience may differ because each dog is different, but I'd say it reduced her anxiety by 80%.
customer_reviews.author: R. Glickman

customer_reviews.title: Could be better with minor improvements.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for my dog but aside from that the placement of the velcro around the neck is way off for the size. Very awkward. I wouldn't recommend. Fabric is stretchy and the wrap around the body is well made for variety of sizes. Its a shame they didn't do that for the front part of the wrap.
customer_reviews.author: J. Muller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The Mellow Shirt has made me a happy pet owner during heavy storms and fireworks. My dog used to freak out to the extent he sometimes hurting himself. When wearing the Mellow Shirt he is calm and settled. And, he seems to love the shirt! I have actually bought him this shirt in 2 different colors. I no longer worry if my dog will be safe during a storm. The shirt can be worn for up to 10 hours at a time. I am extremely pleased with my purchase! I can honestly say, "It is the Perfect shirt for calming my dog!"
customer_reviews.author: cjsec1

customer_reviews.title: a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed the one from my boarder dog for my off-the-wall hyper anxious dog with rain that hasn't even started to fall. Fireworks, thunder, lightening, car backfire, raindrops- pretty much anything except sun and snow. I could not believe how quickly it worked, and nearly half the price of name brand shirt. Now when she wakes me with her terrors, I tell her "we'll get your shirt on." Often she calms a bit very shortly, sometimes still needs mild drug but b/t the 2 she can actually go back to sleep and be calm. A lifesaver for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poor fit first of all. Secondly it just plain doesn't help. She is afraid of thunder. I put it on her when the thunder started and it didn't make one bit of difference in the way she acted. Now, every time the A/C starts she thinks it's thunder. Too bad as I hate seeing her be so upset over every loud sound.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a very nervous dog. He whines and trembles in the car. I tried aromatherapy, that helped slightly. (I think it helped me more! LOL). Now I have this mellow shirt. After reading the reviews I thought this was the answer. Nope. My dog still whines and shakes. Guess I'll have to try Puppy Prozac next...
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, effective and durable
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my mellow shirt! I purchased it in preparation for the 4th of July for my dog who is terrified of fireworks. I definitely think the shirt helped her through a scary time and I appreciated how easy it is to use. It is very durable and the sizing chart helped me pick the perfect size for my pup. Overall this is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Still anxious
customer_reviews.text: While this calming wrap is easy to put on, and fit well, it did not work for my dogs anxiety issue. That is not totally negative, as any calming product I've purchased for her, did not work at all. I might recommend this product, keeping the above in mind and advising the potential purchaser of it.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Ah Ma Zing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What kind of sorcery is this?! My basset mix donut goes nuts when it rains. She will pant, run around, scratches the doors, and just goes nuts!!! It was raining cats and dogs and thunder and lightning tonight and she’s just cool as a cucumber just relaxing. It’s amazing!!! Highly recommend it. She’s about 60 pounds and we bought a large
customer_reviews.author: J Han

customer_reviews.title: Medium was very big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium for my 42 pound dog. I knew she is on the gangly side, so I thought the 25-40 lbs shirt would work. Instead it was massive on her. I ordered the 12-25lbs shirt and it fit much better (I might be a bit off on those sizes, I don’t have the product page pulled up, but you get the idea). Otherwise, the product seems pretty well constructed and my dog doesn’t usually like wearing things, but she keeps these on her.
customer_reviews.author: KEDA

customer_reviews.title: Comforts and calms our small dog!
customer_reviews.text: This comforts my Parent's dog. He is still afraid of storms and will shiver, but he goes to where his coat is stored, and paws to "ask" for his coat. It does give him relief. He is not entirely unafraid, but is much better with storms and fireworks if he has his coat on. This one is easy to put on and to remove. A previous one was super difficult for my Parents to wind around the dog. This one is SO much better, quick and simple to get on and off. He finds comfort in it so much that he will often ask for his coat before any of us hear the thunder.
customer_reviews.author: Karen O.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for My Anxious Pup
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my rescue pup thinking it would help ease her anxiety... She ended up chewing it to pieces within a week. I only had it on her for about an hour at a time, taking it off when she tried to chew it. Either this is for dogs with less anxiety or less chewing issues. Bought this instead of the storm shirt simply because I didn't want her to overheat from the thickness, I thought the stretch was a nice idea and it looked comfortable. But she hated it
customer_reviews.author: Kris Kirton

customer_reviews.title: Frozen in time
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is less than 2lbs currently so I bought a size xxs. It's a tad big so so is everything for her at the moment. I put this on her and it's like she froze in action. Haha she was rambunctious and jumping around. And once this was put on her she stopped moving. It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Cruel

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell, the product doesn't work for my dog. I should have realized by now (14 years) that nothing that works for normal dogs will work on mine. Can't fault the company but also can't give a 5-star review. I can say that when I put her winter coat on, she hates it and will do anything to remove it. When I put this on, she just gave me a dirty look and ran off...so at least she was ok with it being on.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, Cleans Up Well, Bigger than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not for the anxiety but as a wrap to control hair on road trips. I have a 75-80lb German Shepherd who's all chest and mostly muscle, the XL is almost too big around. The length is great though. I've washed this (careful to dry on low heat) and it cleans up very well. The knitting is tight so hair doesn't get stuck in it, but also keeps the dog's hair from shedding everywhere. While we don't have an anxiety problem, I did notice an improvement in travel behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: It dosent really calm them.
customer_reviews.text: My dog Abby is terrified of fireworks so I thought I would get her this shirt this year to see if it would calm her down. Well it didnt help one bit..as you can see in the pic she is sitting on my husband with her mouth wide open and shaking profusly..if your dog is really scared of fireworks this prolly wont work. Although it fit ok and and was easy to put on her its was just wishful thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Ad

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Mellow Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how excited I am over the mellow shirt. I had my doubts, but my little shelties were both so afraid of thunder and fireworks, I decided to give them a try. The first time was last night when my neighbors were starting their 4th of July celebration. Normally, my little fellows would pace and bark; nothing I would do helped calm them. Once their shirts were on, it was quiet - no pacing, no barking. My little girl was still at attention, but she wasn't as anxious as she usually is. Thank you Mellow shirt for coming up with a product that works and is cheaper than the thunder shirt. Scooter and Paisley thank you too.
customer_reviews.author: judy walker

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right after the 4th of July last year. I had just moved, and all the neighbors were setting off fireworks for hours. My dog has never liked thunderstorms, but the fireworks were worse. He pace and whined all night. I have used the mellow shirt with the storms. It seemed to help. But the big test was the 4th of July. The neighbors have been shooting off fireworks for about 2 hours, my dog is laying on his bed asleep with his Mellow shirt on. So glad I bought this. It is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: It tried! My dog is just too much!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old Morkie decided this year (2019) that she is now TERRIFIED of thunderstorms. Bought this thinking is may help and it doesn’t really. She’s prob just her, read plenty of reviews that say it works for others. I will say the color is adorable, it’s fairly well made and fits her well. I bought this particular one as the fabric is lighter weight. She pants sssoooo bad from being so anxious and gets her self so hot. So I needed that light weigh fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: well made perfect fit  does just as it says
customer_reviews.text: my pup is a bit chunky and this wrap has room to adjust comfortably...I have had 2 other brands of the same shirt and this one is equally comfortable and works as stated during recent fireworks and it is made verry well just not as heavy and constricting...I think it is perfect and if my pup were reviewing it she would say..."that's what I'm talking about...good snug fit and breathable....that works great in the summertime heat
customer_reviews.author: Cibil Cleoci

customer_reviews.title: ... have a two year old dog with an intense dislike of riding in cars
customer_reviews.text: I have a two year old dog with an intense dislike of riding in cars. We purchased this vest to help alleviate some of her anxieties and, while I wouldn't say a miracle has happened and she's riding with her head out the window, tongue wagging, I will say it has helped and car rides aren't so stressful for everyone anymore. One star off because I thought I was getting red and I ended up with a pink coat
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Dog didn't care for it
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn't care for it. I put it on and nothing! Dog still barked, still seemed anxious. I thought this would help, but my dog constantly tried taking it off. I guess it depends on the dog, but mine didn't like it. Instead, I am working and training my dog to be less anxious using youtube videos. If you want to find out your dogs problem and nip that problem in the bud, this won't do it. My dog is doing better with his anxiety, but its all due to following youtube training videos, not this.
customer_reviews.author: escarTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This probably saved my little dogs life
customer_reviews.text: My little anxious dog is doing so much better already! His biggest fears are strangers & joggers so he wears it under his harness when we walk downtown. He just got attacked by a big yellow lab on the street while wearing it & the mellow shirt actually protected his little neck & back & physically he’s fine! Mellow shirt actually prevented physical injury to my little Pomchi. With a little medication & this mellow shirt, my little anxious dog is doing so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Taquitos

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put on my dog. The first night my dog still barked at the firework sounds with the vest. My husband took him outside to see what the noise looked like. The next night he did well with the vest. Still nervous but didn’t bark much at all.
customer_reviews.author: samiesue

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a good deal for the money. Its easy on and easy off. I have a 32lb Border Collie, I use it when shes is in the car, she is so excited and anxious, she pants and does the border stare "eye of the tiger " back and forth from window to window. She won't sit still and she will not lay down even on long trips. So far I haven't seem a change in behavior, but we have only gone on 2 short trips so far, 1 about 2 hours, shopping and errands, and 1 about 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: sisira hettiarachchi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about something so simple, but it does help my dog. My daughter was watching him recently and there were fireworks nearby. She said he was on top of her in fear. She put on the shirt and he laid down at the end of her bed . Amazing! We will be using it regularly. It is a light weight, very soft material. The Velcro holds well. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DLE

customer_reviews.title: A miracle for my dod!
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue dog that was abused. During thunderstorms and on really windy days he gets extremely anxious. He acts as if he wants to crawl inside me for protection. I've tried calming drops benadryl and hugging to no avail. Last night a storm came through and I put his thunder coat on him and it was amazing! He was calm instantly. No shaking, panting and he relaxed in the floor and went to sleep. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants a calm 🐕.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adds to anxiety
customer_reviews.text: This has the opposite effect on our husky mix. When it is on her, she paces more and is more anxious. We had both it in preparation for 4th of July events. By the time we used it and discovered it didn't work, it was too late to send back. Will probably donate to the nearest shelter in hopes it will help another anxious dog.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Busby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely sceptical, but this shirt has been a godsend for my dog and me! She is calm during thunderstorms now! Before this shirt, I feared that my dog would have a heart attack during storms because she was so afraid. She would even hide. Now she calmly rests on the couch during the storms. Also, it calms her nerves when we have parties with lots of guests and noise. She enjoys that now with the shirt. My ONLY complaint is that it does not seem to help with her fear of lightning for some reason. Over all- this shirt is a MIRACLE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt
customer_reviews.text: My four-legged grandson suffers big time from allergies and anxiety. It starts with allergies and then his anxiety takes hold him pretty soon he's losing hair he's got hot spots etc. etc. etc. this shirt has definitely giving him a sense of calm. FYI this is a size small.
customer_reviews.author: GracieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work too well on my dog!
customer_reviews.text: This is more like an adjustable dog shirt, that is placed and secured on the pet. My dog is a large Chesador and has anxiety issues of excitement when he gets to go for car rides. I thought that this shirt may be the answer to the problem...but I would say that the shirt only helped reduce his anxiety by about 10%...not good enough to make the rides enjoyable once more...oh well...it was worth a try...
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: YMMV
customer_reviews.text: Your miles may vary. I have two dogs - one with anxiety that reacts to any noise, and another one just a nutcase (barks like a maniac). Purchased two to see how it would work for a week, and unfortunately we didn't see any noticeable changes in behavior. I think if the material were thicker and heavier, similar to a weighted blanket, that could improve the product and the odds of working. Only reason this isn't one star is because I understand this is YMMV - it may work for your dog, and the good thing is the return process was easy. Just don't go expecting a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth a try :)
customer_reviews.text: I was cautiously optimistic about trying this for a sweet nervous dog I recently took in because her elderly owner passed away. I must say I can actually see a positive difference when she wears it. Less pacing, panting and she wags her tail when I put it on her. It’s sturdy yet lightweight so she’s not too hot or bulky. Love the color & price too. Glad I gave it a try for her.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Really helps. Like a hug around your dog.
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. I was skeptical, to say the least. We have a 9 year old goldendoodle. She has always been anxious. She bites her nails and feet when stressed. So I bought the shirt. She was just cut short for swimming season and I thought we'd use it for a hug while it was short. I was surprised with the results. We were hoping to use it a couple of days, instead she uses it everyday. She loves it. Comes to us to put it on even. But the big thing is, she's stopped biting her feet while wearing it!! It's a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Author SA Smith

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: It seemed pretty flimsy for an extra large. It did not relieve my Golden Retriever's anxiety during the fireworks on the 4th of July. I would say that he was not panting so fast as to hyperventilate, but he was restless the entire evening, and would not sit still. I don't want to slam the product, but I would not recommend the product. We will keep it, but I don't see it as a difference maker.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Only helps a little
customer_reviews.text: Seems to quiet my dog - but only a little bit. I was hoping for more, but she is older and has become quite shaky in the car. Happy for some impact, but was hoping for more. It is well made and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Texas

customer_reviews.title: Mellow Shirt Dog Anxiety Calming Wrap
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best product ever! My dog loves it and it helps her immediately. She usually goes and hides during thunderstorms and fireworks, and this mellow shirt allows her to feel comfortable enough to not run away to the other room. I highly recommend this product. Made of high quality material, easy to wrap and adjust velcro strap, soft and durable, fast delivery, and fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fry

customer_reviews.title: The dog loves it too!
customer_reviews.text: We live in the midst of cherry orchards where birds are shooed away with loud cannons. Our min-pin jack Russel mix was panicked all day every day. The shirt worked immediately and she became relaxed. She wears the shirt 8 to 10 hours a day. And if we forget to put it on she will bring to us to let us know. The cherry season is ending and we made it through the 4th of July too! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Tone

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible!! It did absolutely nothing for my dog on the 4th of July. He yapped, turned circles, panted heavily, and ran around crazily the entire night. This is nothing more than a thin t-shirt type of material with velcro straps around the neck and stomach. I wish I could upload the video of my dog going crazy while wearing this nonsense. It was returned!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as the thunder vest at a fraction of the cost!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works like a dream, our older dog had a brand name “thunder shirt” that we bought about 8 years ago and she wears it for thunderstorms and holidays, but my mom recently got a Yorkie mix that is terrified of everything. While the thunder shirt does the exact same thing as This brand of mellow shirt this one is a fraction of the price! And you can not tell the difference! The dog calms down within minutes of the best being put on and he can relax through the night now
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Better price than the “name” brand, but perhaps a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say for sure that it did anything to comfort my shelter rescue dog. He’s easily excited and downright terrified of thunder and fireworks. Unfortunately, the size recommended for my dog was much too big for his girth. The fabric is like a fleece, so I”m not sure it would supply the right amount of swaddling to “comfort” an animal. The placement of the straps was very awkward. But that may have been a sizing issue. I’ve returned it, but I’m not sure I’ll get a smaller size due the the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aids in calming my dog
customer_reviews.text: It's adjustable, so you can make it as snug or loose as needed. It seems to give my dog a bit more confidence during thunderstorms. Not a full fix of his anxiety, but somewhat better than before. He doesn't seem to mind getting the vest on, which is also a positive.
customer_reviews.author: Gail b

customer_reviews.title: Great for warm weatger
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small size for my 15 lb tootsie roll built terrier mix. The weight of the fabric is perfect for summer & the velcro straps are sturdy. Unfortunately, the wrap was way too large. I immediately ordered the extra-small because it will be perfect for my nervous pup!
customer_reviews.author: qrtz

customer_reviews.title: This wrap did not completely take away his anxiety but he is doing much better and that is what counts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this anxiety wrap for my PitBull who is VERY afraid of loud noises. I also bought this wrap in time to use on the 4th of July holiday weekend because I was sure he would have a heart attack with all the louds noises. This wrap did not completely take away his anxiety but he is doing much better and that is what counts. The wrap fit really nice I purchased a Large due to him weighing @ 80 pounds and it looks really stylish also. It is very easy to put on also and my dog doesn't try to take it off either.
customer_reviews.author: LEELEE

customer_reviews.title: Calming shirt, did the trick for road trip
customer_reviews.text: Our dog recently started panting on road trips, so we got this to see if it would calm him for an 8 hour road trip. It worked! We acclimated him to the shirt before the trip, by putting it on a few times for a few minutes at home. The shirt fits great, with stretchy, soft fabric that snuggles around the torso. He seemed comfortable with the shirt, and slept more on road trip, without as much panting. It washed up nicely, too!
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Mellow Shirt
customer_reviews.text: Construction of garment, seems well made The material, lighter, more breathable , cooler then others i have seen. Not sure if it 100 percent works because we have a very , VERY nervous nelly , she not only wore shirt , plus calming aids, plus Benadryl BUT am sure it did help I thought she would fight it or it would take time for her to adjust but she allowed it to be on most the night for over 2 weeks straight ( it like a war zone of fireworks, where we live )
customer_reviews.author: Hzl B

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and cute on my dog.
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be a great product , but my dog has almost chewed through it in one spot, and we took it off of her. She seemed to really like it, but she has been scratching a lot lately, due to some dry skin areas, so that may be why she chewed on it. I'm gonna treat her skin problem, and then put it back on her. She was a rescue dog, and has anxiety issues, so I think it did probably did help her. It looks really cute on her also.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McD

customer_reviews.title: Too thin to do the job
customer_reviews.text: The mellow shirt might warm the dog if there's a chill in the air but it certainly doesn't mellow her out or do anything that a) a thunder jacket might do or b) that her life jacket actually does. The material is a thin fleece that is stretchy. It is well made for a thin jacket but I would not recommend this as a calmative for an anxious dog.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Fits as Expected, Soft, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The item was well made and very easy to use, it's a cotton blend and really soft, velcro fasteners are ample and sturdy, however our dog doesn't have anxiety issues except when flying. We thought it might be helpful for her for that reason, but when we put it on her, she starts shaking and becomes anxious as though she thinks she's being punished or something bad is going to happen. It didn't work for what we were hoping it would, however, I think for an animal with an existing anxiety problem, it would feel very much like a good, safe, comfortable hug.
customer_reviews.author: CheleBellieBean

customer_reviews.title: Works brilliantly!
customer_reviews.text: This works out perfect! My mom wanted this for her pitbull mix because he is so afraid of storms and keeps her awake the whole time so he can be held. Since having this is is so much more at ease and instead of hiding or needing to be held he just lays near her but actually sleep through them and stays calm! Should of bought this ages ago!
customer_reviews.author: A animal lover

customer_reviews.title: You choose which shirt is best.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get the Mellow shirt after paying the super high price for the traditional Thunder shirt a few years ago. The Mellow shirt seems to be working well. My dog seems comfortable wearing it. She is calmer when there is a storm outside. The Mellow shirt (about $25) vs. the Thunder shirt (about $40). Which is the better decision?
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for thunderstorm anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My little Lucy, an 8 year old Havanese, is not as anxious as her brother in storms, but she hugs my side and won't go near a door or window. With this shirt on, she's calm and contented. It's a great help. It's less expensive than the big brand, but I think it's easier to put on and take off, and is a superior product. Glad I tried it. When this wears out, I'll get her another one! Thanks for offering this great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Panos

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I think the shirt works well. My elderly Pug, who went deaf about 6 months ago, is now afraid to be left alone. Thus, I bought the Mellow Shirt and calming chewies hoping they would calm her. They work but she is so smart that when I put the shirt on and give her a chewie, she knows I'm going to leave and fights the calming feeling and it may take hours before she relaxes and I can escape for 1-1 1/2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sedona

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: So got this in hopes it would help my miniature schnauzer stop shaking all the time. I was extremely skeptical, but I thought I may as well try it. I got it just a couple of hours ago AND SHE HAS NOT SHOOK at all!!! I am thrilled! I will order more on payday so she can always have a clean one. For size reference, she weights 10 Pounds and is 12” around her chest. We got the XS.
customer_reviews.author: a.gleave

product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:NavyMellow Shirt is designed to calm your dog for a wide variety of fear and anxiety problems. Mellow Shirt works by applying gentle pressure to your dog's torso, like swaddling an infant. No need for training or medications. Works for most dogs within minutes. Lightweight, breathable fabric. A positive-based, drug-free solution. Machine washable. A widely used, proven method for calming dogs.
